ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Status),
OR( CASE(Status, "New", 1, "Working", 2, "Contacted", 3, "Qualified", 4, "Unqualified", 5, 0 ) <= CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), "New", 1, "Working", 2, "Contacted", 3, "Qualified", 4, "Unqualified", 5, 0 ) || CASE(Status, "New", 1, "Working", 2, "Contacted", 3, "Qualified", 4, "Unqualified", 5, 0 ) - CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), "New", 1, "Working", 2, "Contacted", 3, "Qualified", 4, "Unqualified", 5, 0 ) > 1))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only move foward and cannot skipping status
